name: Erpelfish
description:
Flappy-Bird is kinda annoying, right? But what if there were a whole bunch of interesting  obstacles! Or lots of nice graphics and cool, funny skins! And you could dive to get down faster, dash forward and slow down, so you hopefully don't crash into the obstacle! It isn't stressful but funny and catching. The controls feel natural! It‘s a nice little game to chill out and relax! Maybe hear some nice music while playing?

This version is for MacOS and Windows. In the Windows version, the background is somehow missing but other than that it is working just fine. If enough people are interested, there will be a full version for Windows and maybe Linux, too.

(This is a beta-version and my first indie game. So...

Please give me a short feedback by clicking here

Then, if you want, your name/ youtube etc. will be probably linked in the credits of final version of Erpelfish!)
